sentence: We had a room overlooking the gulf
Beds were very comfortable room clean housekeeping staff pleasant and quick to help with any extra towel needs
The room was clean and the AM staff and the front desk are always nice
Rooms we clean and the pools were nice
Loved our view the beach was fabulous and food was really good in the resturant
Beautiful grounds lovely and fun pool heated pool and hot tub the last two we stayed in mostly
Our room had a great view was quiet and comfortable
Grounds and courtyard very clean shops restaurant 3 pools beautiful water was cold to touch
The views were great room was clean and the price was very reasonable
Great oceanfront location
The cleaning service was good though except for one day when we had to wait until after 3 pm to get our room serviced
The view from our balcony overlooking the Gulf was beautiful however the air was so full of cigarette smoke from neighboring guest rooms that it was not a pleasant experience
Room was nice and clean but way too overly priced
And we never experienced any problem with the room not being clean
The staff and manager refused to discount the room price to make up for it
The hotel was pretty average our room was nice and comfy but you could hear other people in their rooms and in the halls
NEW CARPET UP DATE ROOMS
they changed the whole unit out in 15 mins problem solved
Rooms are clean yet outdated
So this is reflected in my rating of the guest room cleanliness
The view of the beach from my room was worth it
The rooms are nothing super special but they are clean and the beds are very comfortable
I know this hotel is older but it needs some serious renovations in the rooms
The manager did move us to a recently renovated room after witnessing the medical issues my wife sustained staying in one of their older units
Apparently the rooms with balconies are called polside rooms
Moved us to comparable room
We had a pool side room which made our vacation even better
It says will fit 5 people in the two queen bed room
The pools in the hotel are wonderful but the room we were staying in was not good
We booked early with 2 adult 3 kids for room 2 queen beds and pool deck
What are you going to do in the room other than sleep anyways
When we checked in and went to our room we found mold everywhere in the room
As we arrived we approached the front desk to check into our room

Thank God I did n’t see these until the day we were checking out we were packing our room and i saw one roach and my husband killed it and then putting our suitcases on the luggage cart we saw a huge roach next to the air conditioner that I stepped on did n’t know it was there
Other than a small room for 4 people with luggage it was an excellent vacation

With horribly hard rain on a long drive from Cocoa Beach straight obviously beyond their control to come into a highly priced well established highly recommend resort stay as advertise in print marketing only to be lazily by staff w little guest friendly service at check in offers resort updates due to weather availability of services eateries in property room description of room details any other info

Also I would warn future guest that the AC unit that is connected to the patio area dumps condensation onto the patio so if you leave anything like sandals or suits to dry they may float over the edge if you run the unit on low to keep the room consistently cool like we did
The bed was hard as a rock the carpet was dirty the sound on the tv kept going in and out the bathroom was awful nothing like what was pictured
There was no fan or vent in the bathroom so it stays hot and humid in there and air ca n’t move in or out
Rooms need update
Otherwise anyone passing by could see inside room
Sold us a booked room after an 18 hour drive walked into peoples belongings glad they were not in there that would have been even more awkward
no dressers or closets only cubbies under the tv
Housekeeping did not clean our room
I would have like to have been notified as to whether they came or not and what the situation was after looking at the shower drain and if it could be fixed or not
